Today, we launched our strategy to transform Dubai into the smartest city in the world in 3 years, including 100 initiatives and 1000 government services for smart services
Our goal is to have all the city services, facilities and facilities on smart phones .. We want to make a different quality of life for all ..
Transportation systems will be smart and simple and will make people's lives easier. Our electric grid will be smart and we can buy the extra solar home
We will have intelligent parks equipped with the Internet, smart police responsive with the click of a button, and smart neighborhoods that understand the needs of its residents.
Smart City will also contribute to the service of housewives in their daily shopping .. Smart visitors services will start from the moment of boarding the plane heading to the UAE
Our goal is to create a new reality, to facilitate life and to build a new model in development. Our goal is a happier life for our people.
The @EU_Commission met this morning to discuss the situation in #Ukraine.
The events of the last days have shocked us all & reminded us that principles we cherish, like #peace, cannot be taken for granted. #Ukraine
Our most immediate priority is to contribute to a peaceful solution to the current crisis in #Ukraine.
In parallel, the international community should mobilise to help #Ukraine stabilise its economic and financial situation.
Today, the @EU_Commission has identified a package of support to #Ukraine.
The package  combined could bring an overall support of at least €11 billion over the next couple of years. #Ukraine
It is a package designed to assist a committed, inclusive and reforms oriented #Ukrainian Government.
It consists of immediate short and medium term measures offering trade, economic, technical and financial assistance to #Ukraine.

Today we launched a three-year strategy to transform Dubai into a "Smart City". It has 100 initiatives & 1000 Smart government services.
We want all services and facilities in Dubai to be accessible through smart phones. We want to improve quality of life for everyone.
Smart transport systems will make people's lives easier. A smart power grid will let households generate and sell their own solar energy.
Smart parks will have internet. Smart police will respond at the touch of a button. Smart neighborhoods will understand people's needs.
Smart shopping will begin before we leave our homes. Smart tourism will get to know travelers the moment they board a plane to the UAE.
Our goal is to create a better reality, build a new model of development, and achieve a happier life for our people.

EU leaders today discussed #Russia & #Ukraine; joint statement to follow. Main points from the statement in following tweets.
EU leaders strongly condemn Russia's unprovoked violation of Ukrainian sovereignty and territorial integrity.
Press conference live on #Ukraine following the meeting with #EU Heads of State & Government & PM Yatsenyuk http://t.co/oeY0Lp481y
Situation in #Ukraine must de-escalate; failure by Russia to do so will have serious consequences for #EURussia relationship.
3-step approach. First: we decided to suspend bilateral talks with #Russia on #visa matters and on the New Agreement.
In absence of de-escalation, EU will decide on additional measures such as travel bans, asset freezes and cancellation #EURussia summit.
Further steps by #Russia to destabilize situation #Ukraine would lead to severe, far-reaching consequences, incl. broad range economic areas
We commend #Ukraine government for measured response & Ukrainian people for courage & resilience these last weeks.
We commit to providing #Ukraine w/ strong financial backing. Also considering special trade measures & ready to assist on energy security.
In #Ukraine efforts must continue towards free & fair elections, constitutional reform & investigation of all acts of violence.
EU reiterates commitment to signing Association Agreement with #Ukraine. Also with #Moldova & #Georgia no later than end of August.
The first priority is a negotiated and peaceful outcome to the crisis. #Ukraine
Today the #EU has also conveyed a strong message of support to PM Yatseniuk & his government. And through them to the #Ukrainian citizens.
We have decided as a matter of priority that we will sign very shortly the first political chapters of the Association Agreement w #Ukraine.
This will seal the political association of the #EU and #Ukraine.
I am pleased that the @EU_Commission €11 billion aid package for #Ukraine has been welcomed by all Heads of State & Government.
Today, the #EU is acting to support the democratic choices of the #Ukrainian people and to help guarantee #Europe’s peace and stability.
